类 LogFactory

extends Object
    从以下版本开始:
    2013-6-20
    作者:
    zollty

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static Logger getLogger()
      返回以调用者的类命名的Log,是获取Log对象最简单的方法!
      static Logger getLogger(Class<?> classz) 
      static Logger getLogger(String name) 
      static boolean isDebugEnabled()
      已过时。 
      static boolean isEnabledFor(String moduleId)
      已过时。 
      static boolean isInfoEnabled()
      已过时。 
      static boolean isTraceEnabled()
      已过时。 
      static void refreshZolltyLogConfig(Map<String,String> pmap)
      刷新时，一定会更新parrentLogger和Threshold Level，但允许Appender为空，例如：
      rootLogger=TRACE #rootLogger=TRACE,LOG4J logger.org.zollty.dbk=ERROR 没有设置Appender（LOG4J）等，则不更新Appender
      static void refreshZolltyLogConfig(String configName)

    • 方法详细资料

      • getLogger

        public static Logger getLogger(Class<?> classz)

      • getLogger

        public static Logger getLogger()
        返回以调用者的类命名的Log,是获取Log对象最简单的方法!

      • getLogger

        public static Logger getLogger(String name)

      • refreshZolltyLogConfig

        public static void refreshZolltyLogConfig(String configName)

      • refreshZolltyLogConfig

        public static void refreshZolltyLogConfig(Map<String,String> pmap)
        刷新时，一定会更新parrentLogger和Threshold Level，但允许Appender为空，例如：
         rootLogger=TRACE
 #rootLogger=TRACE,LOG4J
 logger.org.zollty.dbk=ERROR
        没有设置Appender（LOG4J）等，则不更新Appender

      • isTraceEnabled

        @Deprecated
public static boolean isTraceEnabled()
        已过时。 
        just return false, and will be removed in the later version. Replacing with logger.isTraceEnabled()

      • isDebugEnabled

        @Deprecated
public static boolean isDebugEnabled()
        已过时。 
        just return false, and will be removed in the later version. Replacing with logger.isDebugEnabled()

      • isInfoEnabled

        @Deprecated
public static boolean isInfoEnabled()
        已过时。 
        just return false, and will be removed in the later version. Replacing with logger.isInfoEnabled()

      • isEnabledFor

        @Deprecated
public static boolean isEnabledFor(String moduleId)
        已过时。 
        just return false, and will be removed in the later version. Replacing with logger.isInfoEnabled()
